name: VS Dave And Bambi 2.5
description:
disclaimer: I DONT OWN VS DAVE AND BAMBI

A mod of Friday Night Funkin that is both funny and hard where Boyfriend rap-battle against some wacky characters like Dave, Bambi and more. You’ve won against a bomb, a clown from a flash animation that can alter reality, and now you’re up against the wheelchaired rap master Dave! Think you can handle? Want more songs? check out Dave and Bambi Golden Apple Edition *Fixed Notes not loading for Some players Updated to v2.5 There are 4 unlockable characters here is how to unlock them while in free play mode: dave: beat bonus song in freeplay/dave/bonus-song mr bambi/bambi: get the worst ending on dave’s week (like under 10% heath on polygonized) 3d bambi: die to any song that has eyesores (songs that have eyesores are polygonized in freeplay/dave/polygonized,Furiosity in freeplay/extra/furiosity, glitch in freeplay/joke/glitch, you must die to WHEN they play the flashing lights show up or you wont unlock 3d bambi) 3d dave: beat polygonized on hard (freeplay/dave/polygonized) tristan: beat dave’s week in story mode/dave golden tristan:beat EVERY week in story mode (dave,bambi and splitathon) in ORDER, dave, then bambi, then spitathon. written by coolidguy89 Songs: Week 1:House Insanity Polygonized Week 2:Blocked Corn-Theft Maze Week 3:Splitathon Extra:Bonus-Song Mealie SuperNova Furiosity Old-Corn-Theft Cheating (Press 7 when playing Supernova or Glitch to unlock) Mod Credits: MoldyGH – Programming, composing the music and doing the background spritesYoutube Channel Rapparep – Dave sprites and health bar iconsYoutube Channel MissingTextureMan101: Co-DeveloperYoutube Channel ArchWk – First song in Bambi week OBVIOUS_NINJA – Boyfriend Harmor Preset KadeDeveloper – Kade Engine TheBuilderXD – Furiosity Health Bar Icons ToasterMike/Krisspo – Furiosity Background The Boneyard – Second song in Bambi week Discord: OFFICIAL VS DAVE DISCORD SERVER: discord! Support: get the merch Original FNF Credits: ninja_muffin99 – Programming KadeDev – Programming PhantomArcade3k and evilsk8r – ARTISTS kawaisprite – TASTY MUSIC As always, good luck and Have Fun!
